mapper.select: select s1.user_code 'userId', s1.order_id 'orderId', s1.book_id 'goodsId', s2.book_name 'goodsName', s1.books_cnt 'goodsCount', s1.order_price 'theGoodsAllPrice', s2.cost_price 'goodsShelfCost', s2.present_price 'goodsPrice' from order_table s1 inner join goods s2 on s1.book_id = s2.book_id where s1.is_delete = 0 and s2.is_delete = 0 and s1.order_id = #{orderId}
